content: The java.lang.Object.toString() method returns a java.lang.String that contains a text representation of the object.  The toString method is implicitly called by the compiler when an object operand is used with the string concatenation operators (+ and +=).
stemmed: the java.lang.object.tostr ( ) method return java.lang.str contain text represent object . the tostr method implicitli call compil object operand use string concaten oper ( + += ) .
